name: youtube-api
description: Backend · Develop an API that consumes the YouTube API to consult videos of a channel of your choosing (please pick a channel with more than 12 videos) · The API you build must be able to handle paging parameters such as the quantity of results requested and page numbers · The API must also be able to receive a word or phrase to look for videos within the selected YouTube channel · If the API does not receive any parameters it must return 12 results (videos) · The format of the results must be JSON · Please develop this is Node.js
